name: µSploit Framework
body:
### Welcome to µSploit Framework home page
µSploit framework is very basic exploit/peneration test tool framework.
Inspirited by websploit and metasploit. Websploits development has been sadly ended years ago so i decided to write my own. I have been focused to make µSploit easy (user friendly) and simple to use as possible.
µSploit is written in python 3, and developed on ubuntu.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
